A simple PlantUML diagram:

Bob: Authentication Request Bob --> Alice: Authentication Response @enduml]]>

Another diagram with more complex syntax:

Foo1 : To actor Foo -> Foo2 : To boundary Foo -> Foo3 : To control Foo -> Foo4 : To entity Foo -> Foo5 : To database Foo -> Foo6 : To collections Foo -> Foo7: To queue @enduml]]>
